io.spine.server.procman

Class CommandRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.procman.CommandRouter

  • public class CommandRouter
extends java.lang.Object
    The command router that routes all commands in one call.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getThis

        protected CommandRouter getThis()
        Returns typed reference to this.

        This method provides return type covariance in fluent API methods.

        See Also:
        add(Message), addAll(Iterable)

      • routeAll

        public io.spine.server.procman.CommandRouted routeAll()
        Posts the added messages as commands to CommandBus.

        The commands are posted in the order their messages were added.

        The method returns after the last command was successfully posted.

        Returns:
        the event with the source and produced commands

      • getSource

        protected io.spine.core.Command getSource()
        Obtains the source command to be routed.

      • addAll

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
protected T addAll(java.lang.Iterable<com.google.protobuf.Message> iterable)
        Adds all command messages from the passed iterable.

      • hasNext

        protected boolean hasNext()
        Tests whether the queue of command messages to be routed is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the queue is empty, false otherwise

      • commandMessages

        protected java.util.Iterator<com.google.protobuf.Message> commandMessages()

      • route

        protected io.spine.core.Command route(com.google.protobuf.Message message)
        Creates a new command from the passed message and posts it to the CommandBus.

        This method waits till the posting of the command is finished.

        Parameters:
        message - the command message for the new command
        Returns:
        the created and posted Command

      • next

        protected com.google.protobuf.Message next()
                                    throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Gets and removes the next command message from the queue.
        Returns:
        the command message
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the queue is already empty
